General.Name: uPI Semiconductor Corp
General.Description: uPI Semiconductor Corp., an IC design company, designs and manufactures analog and mixed-signal power management solutions in electronic systems in Taiwan and internationally. It offers power management products, such as DC/DC buck controllers and converters, power device drivers, low dropout regulators, power switch ICs, LED driver ICs, charging ICs, power monitoring, current consoles, and integrated power storage; battery management products, including PTIC and charger ICs; low, middle, and high voltage power MOSFET products; OP-amplifiers; and GaN solutions. uPI Semiconductor Corp. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.
